
---
title: '优派推出新款 Mini LED 显示器：4K 144Hz HDR1000，首发 4999 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/7c03284f-5bdc-42d4-8082-80ccfcdad555.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sat, 27 Aug 2022 11:52:12 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/7c03284f-5bdc-42d4-8082-80ccfcdad555.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="b686"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 8 月 27 日消息，优派现已推出新款 Mini LED 显示器，型号为 VX2722，27 英寸 4K 144Hz HDR1000 规格，首发 4999 元。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="9b3b"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/7c03284f-5bdc-42d4-8082-80ccfcdad555.png" w="820" h="746" title="优派推出新款 Mini LED 显示器：4K 144Hz HDR1000，首发 4999 元" width="820" height="746" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="9b11"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/a56450b3-fa66-49a5-8e74-dd178971ff8e.png" w="788" h="616" title="优派推出新款 Mini LED 显示器：4K 144Hz HDR1000，首发 4999 元" width="788" height="616" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="1d4e">IT之家了解到，这款显示器搭载了 27 英寸 IPS 屏，<strong>4K 分辨率，144Hz 刷新率，576 分区背光</strong>，SDR 亮度达到 600 尼特，HDR 亮度可达 1000 尼特，获得了 DisplayHDR1000 认证。量子点技术加持下，这款显示器可达<strong> 99% Adobe RGB 色域和 95% DCI-P3 色域</strong>。</p><p data-vmark="f972">其他方面，这款显示器搭载了两个 HDMI 2.1 接口、一个 DP1.4 接口，还有全功能 USB-C 接口，支持 90W 反向供电；底座支持升降旋转，内置立体声音响。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100033766191"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/223578/15/15010/92848/63048bd5E369ba394/11263def2b729a49.jpg" title="优派推出新款 Mini LED 显示器：4K 144Hz HDR1000，首发 4999 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">优派 27 英寸 4K144Hz MiniLED 量子点 1ms IPS 广色域</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 4999 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
